thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Horace Mann Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.00

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Horace Mann Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.00
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Horace Mann Educators Corp:
* HORACE MANN REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 NET INCOME OF $3.00 PER SHARE AND CORE EARNINGS OF $0.65 PER SHARE*
* Q4 CORE EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.65 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.00 * SEES FY 2018 CORE EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.10 TO $2.30 * HORACE MANN EDUCATORS - ‍ONE-TIME FAVORABLE TAX BENEFIT OF $99.0 MILLION, OR $2.37 PER DILUTED SHARE DUE TO PASSAGE OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 IN Q4​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
